resources.string: Your task is to identify the number that is different from all the others as quickly as possible.
Your task is to identify the word that is different from all the others as quickly as possible.
Your task is to identify the sad emoji as quickly as possible.
Your task is to choose a shape that exactly matches or completely does not match in color and shape with the proposed option.
Your task is to choose the correct color of the word without paying attention to its name.
Your task is to specify the property of the object located on the screen as quickly as possible
Your task is to specify the property of the object located on the screen as quickly as possible
Your task is to indicate where the blue plane is flying and where the red one is flying from.
Your task is to compare two tables and indicate whether they are the same or not. Tables may be upside down.
